bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition following a localized throat disease with difficulty speaking or a very low and deep, rather than mellow and full, voice. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 2: 射干湯，主春冬傷寒，秋 夏中冷，咳嗽，曲拘不得氣息，喉鳴，瘂，失聲，乾嗽無唾，喉中如哽 者方 , “The decoction with she gan is a recipe to control harm caused by cold in spring and winter, being struck by cold in autumn and summer, with cough, a bent body making it impossible to breathe, sounds in the throat, muteness-illness , loss of voice, dry cough without saliva, and a feeling in the throat as if one were choking”.
